item.title: Navigating Patient Confusion on Processed Foods
item.description: Patients are confused about which processed foods are harmful. Here’s how you can guide them. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Obesity Treatment: Study Backs Dual-Drug Strategy
item.description: In the SIBAMATE study, more than 60% of patients lost at least 5% of body weight after 3 months of using sibutramine-topiramate. Medscape Medical News

item.title: FDA Removes REMS Program for Thyroid Cancer Drug Vandetanib
